snippet: Hardaway had 22 points as the Knicks earned their fifth road victory of the season, giving Coach Derek Fisher a win in his return to Staples Center.
lead_paragraph: Hardaway had 22 points as the Knicks earned their fifth road victory of the season, giving Coach Derek Fisher a win in his return to Staples Center.

headline.print_headline: Tim Hardaway Jr. Leads Knicks Past Lakers for a Rare Road Win
headline.main: Tim Hardaway Jr. Leads Knicks Past Lakers for a Rare Road Win
